name: MCP Navigator
title: MCP Server - Open Source Dynamic Navigation Management
description: A Next.js navigation server with Tailwind & Shadcn/UI, using GitHub API for content management. No database required for dynamic route updates.
intro: MCP Server is a dynamic, database-free navigation system built with Next.js, Tailwind CSS, and Shadcn/UI, featuring a content management system powered by the GitHub API for seamless route updates and administration.
author: nobugcode.com
